document_data.mainbody:
Lonthalin Mintar was a human wizard in Baldurs Gate in the mid–14 century DR.
Lonthalin, like many of his fellow minor mages, worked from a stall in the Wide, an open market of Baldurs Gate, and was a fixture there around 1366 DR. He specialized in spells that provided temporary cosmetic adornments, such as fantastic hairstyles, tattoos, scents, and changes in color and making revealing costumes cling. He could make disguises for a fee of 25–100 gp.
